location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Photographic print with additions in crayonDimensions:622 x 705 mm, on sheet 681 x 765 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Map showing the extent of the land on the sea coast between villages of Bisaitin (Busaiteen) and Dair with land owned by the RAF outlined in red and the leased area indicated in green.Classified “Secret".Shows the position of the civil and RAF landing grounds with camp and petrol dispersal area; and the existing and proposed site of the BOAC (the British Overseas Airways Corporation) & Oil Co. buildings. Properties labelled with owners’ names given.Contains references to ‘PA Memo C/509 dated 23/4/42 (Appendix H)’.
